posts.title: Shower Shaving Foot Rest
posts.content: The shower shaving foot rest is the leg-shaving woman’s truest companion in the shower. For those women who like a clean shaven leg without the fuss of sitting down in the bath or falling down with legs splayed, this foot rest saves, and shaves, the day.

posts.title: Hand Lettering 101 Book
posts.content: Transform your illegible chicken scratch into beautiful handwriting with Hand Lettering 101. In this helpful book, social media darling Chalkfulloflove demonstrates comprehensive step-by-step instructions on how to create gorgeous fonts and designs.

posts.title: Home Gesture Control System
posts.content: Rid yourself of those clunky remotes and bring your home into the twenty-first century using this home gesture control system. It connects with your home’s smart devices so you can easily control them with nothing more than a simple gesture.

posts.title: Past Present Future Watch
posts.content: Help yourself stay focused on the present with the past present future watch. This clever watch’s quirky face helps you take a greater appreciation of the ‘now’ by only displaying the current time through a small open window located at the top center of the watch.

posts.title: Hanging Tent Platform
posts.content: Cowards need not apply to spend a night sleeping in the hanging tent platform. This suspended domicile makes a great resting spot for the weary and experienced mountain climber that has no qualms in spending the night hanging from a vertical mountainside.

posts.title: Anti-Love Valentine’s Day Card
posts.content: Show your favorite fan of The Office a little love this Valentine’s with this anti-love Valentine’s Day card. The cover features the always diligent Dwight Schrute refuting the popular “love is in the air” saying with something even more romantic – cold hard facts.

posts.title: Sarcastic Magic 8-Ball
posts.content: Get answers to life’s biggest questions with a little sass by asking the almighty sarcastic magic 8-ball. Upon asking it your burning questions, the all-knowing 8-ball will reply with a variety of hilarious quips like “ask me if I care” or “in your dreams”.

posts.title: Master Key 20-In-1 Multi-Tool
posts.content: Maximize and enhance your everyday carry without adding bulk with the MSTRkey. This multi-tool is the same size as a common house key, fits on all the same key rings, and conveniently features 20 tools you might need in a pinch.

posts.title: Scented Duct Tape
posts.content: Who says being kidnapped and bound by duct tape has to be an unpleasant experience? With the invigorating aroma provided from the scented duct tape you’ll be so enthralled by each of the savory scents that you’ll hope your ransom never gets paid.

posts.title: Programmable Pet Feeder
posts.content: Simplify your life by automating when your pet receives it’s food, and how much your pet receives with this programmable pet feeder from Petmate. The easy design allows you to program food drops up to three times per day and at custom portion amounts.

posts.title: Chihuahua Taco Holder
posts.content: Ensure your tacos don’t fall and spill out of their shell when you invite the Mexican chihuahua taco holder over. This cute and well trained chihuahua features three handy taco shaped crevices that can accommodate up to three tacos at a time.

posts.title: Bunk Bed Hammock
posts.content: Ensure you and your honey stay dry and bug free next time you go camping by bringing along this bunk bed hammock. Apart from keeping you off the hard ground, the clever design provides protection from rain, insects, and other critters that may be lurking.
